skins.shipDescription: Omaha-class light cruiser― Concord, hull number CL-10.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am an Omaha-class light Cruiser, Concord, of the Eagle Union~ After many weapon modifications, you can certainly count on me~ probably? Hehe.
skins.acquisition: Light cruiser Concord, reporting in. Do I like lollipops and ice cream―― huh? Does the Commander always like to gaze at people’s feet? Hehe.
skins.login: It’s nice to see you again, Commander~ Did you bring me any yummy candy?
skins.details: Do your best, Commander, if you perform well then there’ll be lollipops waiting for you~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Hmm, I’m getting tired from all this walking… it seems you got time on your hands, come and give me a feet rub~?
skins.secretaryIdle2: I always want to go to the town of my namesake~ If we get a chance can we go?
skins.secretaryIdle3: I am a very helpful individual~ Can’t you tell? Hehe, looks like we’ll need more time to understand one another~
skins.secretaryTouch: Do you also like candy? If you ask me nicely, perhaps I’ll share some of mine? Teehee.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, if you touch me here again, then I’ll have to send you flying with a high kick~

skins.shipDescription: Apple candy, Taiyaki, and fried noodles~ The Sakura Empire’s Temple Fair really is something~ Hehe Commander, do you also want to take a bite of my apple candy? Here you go~
skins.acquisition: Apple candy, Taiyaki, and fried noodles~ The Sakura Empire’s Temple Fair really is something~ Hehe Commander, do you also want to take a bite of my apple candy? Here you go~
skins.login: The night-time events at the Temple Fair is starting soon, shall we go take a look?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Hmm… with my hair up like this, I can’t properly wear my headphones~ Commander, do you want to give it a try~? Perhaps it’ll be very suitable on you.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hmm… walking around this temple is very tiring, hehe, can you give me a piggyback ride Commander?~
skins.secretaryIdle3: On occasion, it’s nice to try out more exotic dresses. What do you think Commander, does this suit me?
skins.secretaryTouch: Even though lollipops are a must-have, but apple candy also have a distinct apple flavor. Sigh… it’s so hard to choose~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander~? You can either be kicked or stepped on by me, please choose?

skins.JPClientName: スウィ`ティ`クリスマス
skins.shipDescription: Merry Sweetsmas, Commander! Today, I get to eat as many sweets as I want without anyone saying things about it~? Hmm, I already eat this much every day? I guess so~
